short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and convert images to JPG, PNG, WebP and other formats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right-click to save any image in the format you need right from the browser, including WEBP, PNG, JPG, AVIF, GIF, and more. You can also use the popup image converter to drag and drop images for quick image conversions.

üí° Features:

- Right-Click to Save: Instantly save images in various formats directly from the context menu.
- Popup Image Converter: Drag and drop images into the extension popup for conversion.
- Multiple Formats Supported: Convert images to WEBP, PNG, JPG, BMP, TIFF, and more.

üíª How to Use:

1. Install the Extension: Add Save As Image to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Right-Click on an Image: Browse the web and find an image you want to save.
3. Select 'Save As Image...': Right-click on the image and choose 'Save As Image...' from the context menu. It'll be next to your other Chrome Extensions.
4. Choose Your Format: Select your desired format from the options available.
5. Save the Image: The image will be converted and downloaded in the selected format.
6. Use the File Converter: Open the extension popup, then drag/drop an image to convert it. Choose your desired output format and download the converted file.

üñºÔ∏è Supported Image Formats:

The supported image formats include: WEBP, PNG, JPG, BMP, TIFF, and more. Check the promotional screenshots for the complete list.
